channel.title: Transit on Mountain Doodles
channel.description: Recent content in Transit on Mountain Doodles

item.title: TOD
item.description: Just saw this excellent post looking at density around transit stations today and though I should pull out some numbers to go with the pretty visuals. And with CensusMapper’s new capabilities of populating custom geometries with census data estimates it’s super-easy to do. Population density is only one measure of interest here, job density or amenities density would be others. But for now let’s focus on population, so how many people live near the rapid transit stations.
